title: Hare Krishna
description: Hare Krishna organization serving free vegetarian meals during of the week for lunch and dinner. On Sunday, food is offered for a small fee. At 7pm, hare krishna celebration begins, and ends with veg dinner - free for those who participate. Previously located at Rua Alberto Bolliger, 288, Sep 2015. Confirmed open at Rua Duque de Caxias, Sept 2015.
